GK17kvrtrsuu:296_4: na bhavati / same pāde dvitīye caturthe nirgatamaṃtaraṃ vyavadhānaṃ yāsāṃ tā nirantarā

GK17kvrtrsuu:1273_6: yathopari tathā śeṣamiti punarapyamuṃ vidhiṃ kuryāt / yadā upari gururbhavati laghuṃ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1273_7: nyasya guroradha iti vidherabhāvādyaḥ pūrvadeśādūne dadyādgurūṇi iti ūnapradeśo gurubhiḥ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1273_8: pūryata ityarthaḥ / evamanena prakāreṇa tāvannyāsaḥ kartavyo yāvatsarvalaghuḥ pado
GK17kvrtrsuu:1273_9: bhavati / prastāryate iti prastāraḥ varṇānāṃ vinyāsaviśeṣaḥ / evaṃ caturakṣarapāde
GK17kvrtrsuu:1273_10: ṣoḍaśavṛttāni bhavanti / chaṃdāṃsi vilīyante asyāmiti chaṃdovicitiśchaṃdaḥśāstram /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1276: naṣṭasya yo bhavedaṃkaḥ tasyārdhe 'rdhe same ca laḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1278_0: prastāradarśitānāṃ vṛttānāṃ madhye yadvṛttaṃ naṣṭaṃ luptaṃ bhavati tasya naṣṭasya
GK17kvrtrsuu:1278_1: yo bhavedaṃka ekādisaṃkhyā tasya ardhe 'rdhe same ca aṃke sati lo laghurbhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1278_2: viṣame ekaṃ ādhāya prakṣipya tasyārdhe 'rdhe gururbhavet / yathaitasmiṃścaturakṣare
GK17kvrtrsuu:1278_3: chaṃdasi paṃcamaṃ vṛtaṃ naṣṭam / tasya aṃkaḥ paṃca sa ca ardhaṃ na prayacchati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1278_4: saikaḥ kriyate tadā ṣaḍbhavanti / te ardhaṃ kriyante / ardhitāstrayo bhavanti / tadardhe
GK17kvrtrsuu:1278_5: guruḥ prāpyate punastrayo 'rdhaṃ na prayacchanti / saikāścatvāraḥ / te 'pi ardhastadardhe
GK17kvrtrsuu:1278_6: punarlabdho gurudvayoḥ samatvāt / tadardhe laghuḥ prāpyate punareko 'rdhaṃ na prayacchati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1278_7: saikordvyaḥ tadardhe punarapi gurureva labhyate / itthaṃ naṣṭasyodāharaṇam / tathā
GK17kvrtrsuu:1278_8: ca / ādyau dvau gurū tābhyāṃ parako laghustato gururiti / ';
GK17kvrtrsuu:1285: laghusthā ye tu tatrāṃkāstaiḥ saikairmiśritairbhavet // KVrk_6.5 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1286_0: kenacittadvṛttaṃ prastāryakatamat iti saṃkhyāparijñānā uktaṃ taduddiṣṭamucyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1286_1: pūrvatra vṛttaṃ na jñāyate / ataḥ saṃkhyayā naṣṭamuddhriyate / atra punarvṛttaṃ jñāyate
GK17kvrtrsuu:1286_2: saṃkhyā na jñāyate ataḥ saṃkhyāparijñānārthaṃ uddiṣṭamidamucyate / tasya uddiṣṭavṛttasya
GK17kvrtrsuu:1286_3: prathamādakṣarādārabhya upari dviguṇānaṃkān samālikhet / yathā / asminneva caturākṣare
GK17kvrtrsuu:1286_4: chaṃdasi ekaṃ vṛttaṃ uddiṣṭaṃ tasya dvau varṇau gurū tato laghustato 'pi guruḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1286_5: tatra uddiṣṭe vṛtte laghuni tiṣṭhantīti laghusthā ye punaraṃkāścatvāraḥ taiścaturbhiḥ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1286_6: saikaiḥ ekena sahitaiḥ paṃcabhiruddiṣṭaṃ bhavet / uddiṣṭasaṃkhyā bhavet / caturakṣarāyāṃ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1293_0: yāvaṃta eva vṛttabhavā varṇā tāvata eva saikān ekasahitānyathā / caturakṣarajātau
GK17kvrtrsuu:1293_1: catvāro ye varṇāstān saikān paṃca / auttarādharyataḥsthitān uparyuparibhāvena sthitān
GK17kvrtrsuu:1293_2: ekādikrameṇaiva etānupari upari nikṣipet nidadhyāt / upāntyato antyasamīpānnivarteta
GK17kvrtrsuu:1293_3: vyādyudyeta / tyajan pariharan ekaikaṃ ūrdhvabhāgāt / evamanena prakāreṇa kasmādiyaṃ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1293_4: ekadvyādilagukriyāṃ pravartata ityāha / uparyādyādguroriti uparisthitān ādyādguroḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1293_5: ko 'rthaḥ / sarvaguruvarṇavṛttasakāśāt ityarthaḥ / ādyaṃ kila sarvagurvakṣaramekaṃ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1293_6: vṛttaṃ parikalpate / etacca prastāre darśitaṃ yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1295_0: pāde sarvagurāvādyāllaghuṃ nyasye'ti tena tasmāt adha iyaṃ ekadvyādilagukriyā pravartate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1295_1: tatra paṃcasu varṇeṣu uttarādharabhāvena sthāpiteṣu adhaḥsthita ekastaduparisthe
GK17kvrtrsuu:1295_2: nikṣipyate / sa ca tathaiva tiṣṭhati tyajannekaikamūrdhvata iti vīpsavaśādekadaiva
GK17kvrtrsuu:1295_3: sthitimaṃtareṇa nikṣiptatvāt punarnikṣepabhāvādekaikatyāgaśca na saṃbhavati tasmātsvarūpeṇa
GK17kvrtrsuu:1295_4: sthita eva upari kṣipyate / tato dvitīye sthāne dvau varṇau bhavataḥ tau tṛtīyena
GK17kvrtrsuu:1295_5: kṣipyeta tatra trayo bhavanti / tacca caturthe nikṣipyante te catvāro bhavanti / ‘
GK17kvrtrsuu:1296_0: upāntyato nivartate tyajannekaikamūrdhvataḥ' uparitanamekaṃ tyajyate tatra na kṣipyate
GK17kvrtrsuu:1296_1: ityarthaḥ / vīpsā ta eva adhobhāgāt punarnikṣepe kriyā pravartate tena adhaḥsthita
GK17kvrtrsuu:1296_2: eva eko dvitīye sthāne nikṣipyate tatra ca trayo bhavanti / tacca tṛtīye nikṣipyante
GK17kvrtrsuu:1296_3: tatra ṣaṭbhavanti upari ekaṃ tyajannivarteta / ādyaṃ ekaṃ vṛttaṃ sarvaguruḥ tasmāddekadvyādilagukriyā
GK17kvrtrsuu:1296_4: pravartete / tata ekaḥ sarvaguruḥ catvāri dvilaghūni ṣaṭtrilaghūni catvāri caturlaghūni
GK17kvrtrsuu:1296_5: ekaṃ sarvalaghuḥ eṣā lagukriyā sarvalaghuprastāreṇa pratīyate asyāstu eṣa eva kramaḥ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1307_0: lagukriyāyāṃ ye aṃkāsteṣāṃ sandohastasminvimiśrite pīḍīkṛte saṃkhyā bhavet / iyaṃ
